document_data.name: That Which Watches
document_data.mainbody: '''That Which Watches''' was a [[death knight]] sentry that guarded the entrance to the [[Murder Tribunal]] deep in the [[Undercellar]] of [[Baldur's Gate|Baldur's Gate's]] [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: That Which Watches wore a set of intricately decorated [[plate mail]], ''[[blackguard's gauntlets]]'', plate [[boot]]s, and a horsetail [[helmet]]. The creature's armor was lines with [[gold]]. It carried a [[longsword]].
document_data.Abilities: That Which Guards shared abilities and vulnerabilities of other [[undead]] creatures. It could lang smiting strikes of great power that could leave the targets staggered.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, That Which Watches was placed to stand guard of the entrance to the Murder Tribunal alongside [[That Which Lurks (death knight)|That Which Lurks]] and [[That Which Guards]]. The creature spoke in rhymes with an archaic turn of phrase.
